translation.Name: Belgium Note - Belgian Military Base #1
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_0: We just received orders to lockdown Brussels due to a viral infection that has spread to Belgium.
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_2: All civilians must be contained and secured from infection. All infected civilians and personnel must be quarantined to keep the infection away from the clean.
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_4: Infected personnel must be transported to the Nulirane Research Facility in hopes of developing an antivirus.
